name: flatnotes
description: Flatnotes is a self-hosted note-taking app that stores notes in flat markdown files, enabling full control and portability. Includes tagging, search, and a clean functional UI ideal for private journaling or documentation.
features: Note-Taking: Markdown-based notes, Flat file storage, Tagging and search. Portable personal knowledge base.
Full Control: Your notes in plain files. Complete portability.
Clean UI: Functional and minimal. Distraction-free writing.
Private: Perfect for journaling and docs. Self-hosted privacy.
Markdown Editor: Rich text formatting. Flexible writing.
Tags: Organize notes by topic. Easy categorization.
Search: Find notes instantly. Powerful filtering.
Dark Mode: Easy on the eyes. Comfortable reading.
Mobile-Friendly: Works on all devices. Access anywhere.
Version Control: Git-compatible storage. Track changes.
